data.name: mnuAuxiliaryData_ToolTip
data.value: Holds all auxiliary data and functionallity.

data.name: mnuKCResourcesData_ToolTip
data.value: Holds all knowledge & collaboration main data and functionallity.

data.name: ConfigDSDescription
data.value:
Directory Service Key Functionalities:

Information management of organizations, persons, positions and functions:
  • Multiple organizations.
  • Full organization charts set up.
  • Dynamic relationships between organizations.
  • Geographical and functional areas connections.
  • Facilities identification.
  • Users, permissions and roles.

data.name: DefaultDSDescription
data.value:
Directory Service Key Functionalities:

Information management of organizations, persons, positions and functions:
  • Multiple organizations.
  • Full organization charts set up.
  • Dynamic relationships between organizations.
  • Geographical and functional areas connections.
  • Facilities identification.
  • Users, permissions and roles.

data.name: DefaultDSOrganization
data.value: Please use your left menu to access solution tools.

data.name: ConfigIADescription
data.value:
Improvement Actions Key Functionalities:

Treatment of exceptions and improvement projects:
  • Multiple improvement projects management.
  • Multiple dynamic classifications based on standards.
  • Set-up of strategies, measures and actions.
  • Impacts on processes.
  • Projects and exceptions completion management.
  • Exceptions – non conformance – reception and corrective actions implementation.

data.name: ConfigKCDescription
data.value:
Collaboration & Knowledge Key Functionalities:

All information and people involved in EMS solution participate in a knowledge and collaboration network.
  • Knowledge resources centralization.
  • Multiple dynamic classifications based on standards.
  • Types of resources dynamic definition (i.e.: policy, procedure, form-record, etc.).
  • Versioning management.
  • Resource expiry date schedule management (i.e.: procedure, legal document, etc.).
  • Subscriptions.
  • Collaboration centers (forums, news, wiki, rss, access records, ranking, etc.).
  • Knowledge base permanently updated.

data.name: ConfigPADescription
data.value:
Perfomance Assessment Key Functionalities:

Indicators and formulas management including all entities needed to establish performance indicators.

- Indicators definition:
  • Multiple dynamic classifications based on standards.
  • Normal-abnormal conditions definition.
  • Management of magnitudes and measurement units.
  • Measurement devices set up.
- Data management:
  • Manual and/or automatic data collection (i.e. data entry or PLC input).
  • Data checking (data integrity and validity checking within its normal or abnormal range).
  • Data reconciliation.
- Exception management:
  • Management of compliance requirements, including warnings and alerts when an abnormal or discordant value is detected or a key task, such a calibration, is not performed.
- Data calculation:
  • Creation of formulae.
    • Calculation engine
- Reporting:
  • Full automatic charting capabilities.
    • Data comparison and analysis.

data.name: ConfigPFDescription
data.value:
Processes Framework Key Functionalities:

Monitoring processes management according to established planning:
  • Multiple programs, processes and/or projects management.
  • Multiple dynamic classifications based on standards.
  • Schedule and planning.
  • Recurrence.
  • Task assignment (operatives, measurements, calibrations, etc.).
  • Completion reports.
  • Non compliance alerts.
  • Exceptions management.

data.name: ConfigRMDescription
data.value:
Risks and Potentials Key Functionalities (Under Development):

Management of risks and potentials– threats and opportunities – which affects performance indicators normal-abnormal conditions.
  • Multiple dynamic classifications based on standards.
  • Likelihood and consequences dynamic matrices.
  • Records and reports.
  • Performance indicators and monitoring processes connection.

data.value:

Treatment of exceptions and improvement projects:

  • Multiple dynamic classifications based on standards.
  • Set-up of strategies and measures.
  • Processes connection.
  • Projects and exceptions completion management.
  • Exceptions – non conformance – reception and corrective actions implementation.
